prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small aquatic creature with a sleek body and vibrant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a round shape and large expressive eyes, perfect for a friendly companion.
Show me a Bug-type Pokemon that has unique purple markings and a curious personality, often found in forests.
Design a Pokemon with a streamlined, fish-like body that is adept at swimming and evading predators.
Generate a creature that appears timid and shy, with a soft color palette, perfect for a gentle environment.
Make a Pokemon that has a dual nature, capable of both aquatic and land living, with distinctive fins.
Give me an image of a tiny Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a playful yet cautious demeanor.
